

// e = 2.7182818284590452353602874713526624977572470936999595749669676277240
       


// approximation of e using Taylor's series
!! eapx(n) = SIGMA [0 <= k <= n] ( 1 / k! )


// 10 terms
ea10term = eapx(10)
//ea10term = 2.7182818{011463845} = 9864101 / 3628800 = ( 13 * 71 * 10687 ) / ( 2^8 * 3^4 * 5^2 * 7 )

// 20 terms
ea20term = eapx(20)  
//ea20term = 2.718281828459045 = 6613313319248080001 / 2432902008176640000 = ( 389 * 1341737 * 12670743557 ) / ( 2^18 * 3^8 * 5^4 * 7^2 * 11 * 13 * 17 * 19 )

// 30 terms
ea30term = eapx(30)  
//ea30term = 2.718281828459045235360287471352662{3722258} = 55464002213405654539818183437977 / 20404066139399312202792960000000 = ( 55464002213405654539818183437977 ) / ( 2^26 * 3^14 * 5^7 * 7^4 * 11^2 * 13 * 17 * 19 * 23 * 29 )


PRETTYPRINT ea10term 30
PRETTYPRINT ea20term 30
PRETTYPRINT ea30term 40


ea20termf = FUDGE ea20term
//ea20termf = 2.7182818209504203 = 58011520184037989 / 21341245685760000 = ( 31 * 43 * 199 * 389 * 419 * 1341737 ) / ( 2^17 * 3^7 * 5^4 * 7^2 * 11 * 13 * 17 )
PRETTYPRINT ea20termf

ea30termf = FUDGE ea30term
//ea30termf = 2.7182818284590452353602874713{49}
PRETTYPRINT ea30termf 30


//Reduction: 66 / 106
//Most Reduced:  55464002213405654539818183437887:   53 * 73 * 353 * 4159 * 4513 * 2692973 * 803436423401
//alternate:  2.7182818284590452353602874713{49} = 55464002213405654539818183437887 / 20404066139399312202792960000000 = ( 53 * 73 * 353 * 4159 * 4513 * 2692973 * 803436423401 ) / ( 2^26 * 3^14 * 5^7 * 7^4 * 11^2 * 13 * 17 * 19 * 23 * 29 )
//error:  4.4108855258E-30 = 1 / 226711845993325691142144000000 = ( 1 ) / ( 2^25 * 3^12 * 5^6 * 7^4 * 11^2 * 13 * 17 * 19 * 23 * 29 )
